meanings.sent1: The cloured flowers brightened up the garden.
meanings.sent2: Her cloured dress was a beautiful shade of blue.
meanings.sent3: The cloured balloons made the party more festive.
meanings.sent4: The cloured sunset painted the sky in hues of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The artist's palette was filled with cloured paints ready to be used.

meanings.definition: Having a particular color or colors.
meanings.sent1: The cloured walls of the room matched the furniture perfectly.
meanings.sent2: His eyes were a unique cloured mix of green and brown.
meanings.sent3: The cloured stripes on the cat made it look like a tiny tiger.
meanings.sent4: The cloured feathers of the bird shimmered in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The cloured leaves of the tree changed with the seasons.

meanings.sent1: She cloured the drawing with bright markers.
meanings.sent2: He cloured the walls of his room with a fresh coat of paint.
meanings.sent3: The children cloured the sidewalk with chalk drawings.
meanings.sent4: The artist cloured the canvas with bold strokes of paint.
meanings.sent5: The chef cloured the dish with a sprinkle of fresh herbs.
